text:
Mid/Sr Backend Engineer | Coffee Meets Bagel | San Francisco | Full-Time | On-site https://coffeemeetsbagel.com/jobs/

Coffee Meets Bagel is a dating app that focuses on quality over quantity. We're growing fast and looking for an experienced backend engineer to help build new features which help our users fall in love.

Our stack is Python, C*, Redis, Elastic Search, PG, â€¦

We have a super fun office in SOMA right off the BART line and you'd get to work with a bunch of very smart, driven, passionate, and fun people all dedicated to helping our users find love!

https://jobs.lever.co/coffeemeetsbagel/ea299673-44f3-4509-87...
